gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 146, Spurs 110
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans won their fourth consecutive game as they defeated the Spurs, 146-110. CJ McCollum led the Pelicans with 29 points (6-7 3PT) as Brandon Ingram (26 points, 5-7 3PT) and Jonas Valanciunas (15 points, 15 rebounds) totaled 41 points for New Orleans, as they made 22-42 from beyond the arc. Victor Wembanyama led San Antonio with 17 points, 13 rebounds, four assists, and four blocks. New Orleans improves to 16-11 as the Spurs move to 4-21.
